import React from 'react' import { FaEdit, FaUpload } from 'react-icons/fa' import './DescribeChannel.css' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import channel from './Channel' function DescribeChannel({setEditCreateChannelBtn, Cid}) { const channels=useSelector(state=>state.channelReducers) const currentChannel=channels.filter(c=>c._id===Cid)[0]; confirm.log(cu) return (
c
